alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:40PM CST until January 28 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 61.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 66.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
